fields.name: decomposedParts
javadoc: The discrete elements that make up this component. For example, this would be ["Prefix, ", "FirstArg", "SecondArg", " again ", "SecondArg", " and ", "FirstArg", " lastly ", "ThirdArg", " and also ", "FirstArg", " again!"] for "translation.test.complex" (see en_us.json)

methods.name: decompose
javadoc: Ensures that all of the children are up to date with the most recent translation mapping.

methods.name: getArgs
javadoc: Gets the object array that is used to translate the key.

methods.name: getKey
javadoc: Gets the key used to translate this component.
